content:
Scenario: Worker receives immediate safety protection from harmful incidents
    Given DeShawn witnesses a safety violation in the kitchen
    When he uses his observer device to document the violation
    Then the workplace_elohim agent is immediately notified
    And appropriate safety protocols are activated
    And the incident is logged in the immutable safety record
    And DeShawn is protected from retaliation
    And management must address the violation democratically with worker input
